backend/main.mo: Main canister implements user profiles, service categories, bookings, reviews, and access‑controlled admin/user operations with Map/List storage.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converts old booking records with text status into new variants by mapping and transforming stored Map entries.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, associated frontend files, components, and test IDs for admin dashboard, booking completion, and review UI.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all frontend files describing layout, hooks, screens, chat logic, and booking flows.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes with shared utility classes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in ThemeProvider with global toast notifications.
frontend/src/chat/bookingStateMachine.ts: Implements a multilingual chat-driven booking state machine with intent detection, entity extraction, and step transitions.
frontend/src/chat/entityExtraction.ts: Rule-based extractor that identifies service category, area, priority, location, and time preferences from text using keyword matching with confidence scoring.
frontend/src/chat/intentDetection.ts: Detects user intent and language via multilingual keyword scoring for booking, cancellation, inquiry, and rescheduling.
frontend/src/chat/types.ts: Defines chat message structures, conversation steps, booking draft fields, and conversation state models for the chat flow.
frontend/src/chat/validators.ts: Provides validation for addresses, contact info, time windows, and booking IDs with parsing and error messages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication state with loading and error fallback logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter basic profile info and save it via mutation.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatTranscr: Displays chat messages with timestamps and auto-scroll behavior inside a scrollable area.
frontend/src/components/chat/QuickReplie: Renders a set of selectable quick-reply buttons for chat interactions.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with navigation, branding, auth button, and conditional user/admin links.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout including header, routed content, footer, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBookings.ts: Fetches admin booking data and customer profiles, currently returning placeholders until backend methods are implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookingDetails.ts: Loads detailed booking information for a given booking ID using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookingReview.ts: Fetches a booking’s review and provides a mutation for submitting reviews, with placeholder logic until backend support exists.
frontend/src/hooks/useCancelBooking.ts: Provides a mutation to cancel a booking and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCompleteBooking.ts: Offers a mutation for marking a booking as complete, currently stubbed pending backend implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateBooking.ts: Creates new bookings through the actor and invalidates relevant queries afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the caller’s saved user profile and tracks loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login, identity state, and provides context for authentication status.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Checks whether the current authenticated user has admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/useMyBookings.ts: Retrieves bookings belonging to the authenticated user.
Provides a mutation for rescheduling a booking and updates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCurrentUserPro: Saves the current user's profile through the actor and refreshes profile data.
Fetches a list of service categories from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, and custom chat bubble styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/screens/AdminDashboardScree: Admin dashboard screen handling authentication, admin access checks, and displaying/acting on bookings with customer details.
frontend/src/screens/BookingDetailsScree: Displays booking details with cancel and review actions, handling loading, errors, and user ownership checks.
frontend/src/screens/ChatBookingScreen.t: Conversational booking interface managing chat state, intent handling, and booking actions with persistence.
frontend/src/screens/MyBookingsScreen.ts: Shows a user's bookings with status indicators, navigation to details, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/utils/chatPersistence.ts: Saves, loads, migrates, and clears chat conversation state in localStorage with versioning and expiration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, goals, architectural notes, and existing feature list for a chat-based home service booking app with an added admin dashboard.
